title: LinkedIn pays $13m to settle suit regarding excessive emailing, tells users via email
text:
LinkedIn pays $13m to settle suit regarding excessive emailing, tells users via email 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
LinkedIn has agreed to shell out $13 million to settle a class-action lawsuit brought about by complaints that the company was sending out t...
